boolean.name: isSla
boolean.title: SLA
boolean.help: This option enables the Service Level Agreement, which defines service quality by setting indicators on the maximum resolution time for a ticket, or the transition to a certain stage within a given time. If enabled, your teams will be alerted of the indicators to meet, and you will have access to detailed reports showing SLA performance and service level.

boolean.name: manageTimer
boolean.title: Manage Timer
boolean.help: This enables the Timer tab on a ticket, which allows starting a stopwatch to precisely track the time spent on resolving a ticket.

many-to-one.name: resolvedTicketStatus
many-to-one.title: Resolved status
many-to-one.help: You can define here which status tickets are considered as resolved. Ticket statuses are customizable and can be created from the Configuration/Ticket statuses menu of the Helpdesk module.

many-to-one.name: closedTicketStatus
many-to-one.title: Closed status
many-to-one.help: You can define here which status tickets are considered as closed. Ticket statuses are customizable and can be created from the Configuration/Ticket statuses menu of the Helpdesk module.

many-to-one.name: inProgressTicketStatus
many-to-one.title: On going status
many-to-one.help: You can define here which status tickets are considered as in progress. Ticket statuses are customizable and can be created from the Configuration/Ticket statuses menu of the Helpdesk module.

many-to-one.name: defaultTicketStatus
many-to-one.title: Default status
many-to-one.help: You can define here which status tickets are created with. Ticket statuses are customizable and can be created from the Configuration/Ticket statuses menu of the Helpdesk module.
